page.title: 18WESTON PARK PRIMARY SCHOOL
page.content: The School was opened on{17.2.1961 when the Juniors moved from the Style Acres site. Later the Infants moved next door. At this time there were{two {separate schools.}When the number of pupils dropped the schools were {amalgamated}into the Junior building in{September 1981.}(The Infant school became Bluebell Valley Nursery School). There is a{Hall}which is also the Gym and Dining Room, with a Kitchen on the side. There are{4 {areas, each with 3 classrooms, cloakroom and toilets. There is a Stock Cupboard, Library, Staffroom and Offices. There is a large{Playing {Field}and{Playgrounds.}About 220 pupils aged from{4 to 11}are in 8 different classes. The 2nd Year Juniors wrote this screen and helped with the Domesday Project. Weston Park Primary School
